evidence: The limit of d tau of t, as tau approaches zero, is zero everywhere except at t equals zero.
triples.o: zero everywhere except at t equals zero
triples.s: limit of d tau of t

concepts.term: It's equal to one divided by two tau when t is between minus tau and tau.
systems behave in response to various inputs

triples.evidence: This brings us to an important mathematical idea - the limiting process, which gives us a way to model an ideal impulse.
